#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/riskassessment-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/RiskAssessment \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw
